response.original_title: The Golden Age of Porn: Christy Canyon 2
response.overview: Christy Canyon 2 is yet another gem in the Gents DVD series The Golden Age of Porn. For those of you unfamiliar with Christy, as I was prior to this film, two of her most outstanding assets are her large gorgeous breasts. They're so lusciously plentiful that it's impossible not to have your attention grabbed by them (and then want to grab them back!). Not to belabor the point, but I gotta say that the best part about Christy's breasts is that they're 100% all natural...nothing fake about 'em.
